product.name: Pocket Wifi
product.description: The Yoowifi Pocket Wifi device offers fast and reliable internet access wherever you go. Perfect for travelers and remote workers, it allows you to connect up to 8 devices simultaneously. Yoowifi provides a variety of data plans tailored to your needs, whether you're heading out for a weekend or traveling for an extended period. With coverage in multiple countries, it's the ideal travel companion.

tabs.title: Description
tabs.content: It is easy to use and boasts a sleek, minimalist design. Simply turn it on, connect your devices, and you’re good to go! No more worrying about complicated setup processes or bulky equipment. But that’s not all – our Pocket WiFi devices also offer strong and reliable connectivity, ensuring that you stay connected no matter where you are. Whether you’re on a business trip or a family vacation, you can enjoy high-speed internet without any interruptions.

tabs.title: Specifications
tabs.content:
CPU: SC8310LTE-FDD：Bands 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 7 / 8 / 12 / 13 / 17 / 18 / 20 / 25 / 26 /28 / 66
LTE-TDD：Bands 34 / 38 / 39 / 40 / 41 (194M)
WCDMA：Bands 1 / 2 / 4 / 5 / 8
TD-SCDMA：NO CDMA：NO
EVDO：NO
GSM：850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
Max speed：Download 150Mbps / Upload 50Mbps
Wi-Fi：2.4GHz 802.11 b / g / n 1T1R
Max WiFi Connection：8
Battery：3000mAh
Ports：Type-C USB
Input：5V – 1A
Item size：120mm x 64.6mm x 12mm
Item weight：112g
Shell Material：Plastics

tabs.title: What's Included
tabs.content:
50GB global data is applicable to 90 countries.
Speed of service is dependent on the mobile network partner.
For order cancellation, a charge of 10% of the order will apply.
General terms and conditions apply.
Yoowifi reserved the rights to make changes anytime.

features.heading: Key Features
features.subHeading: Don't let slow internet tie you down! Switch to our portable solutions to experience connectivity without boundaries.

aboutUs.title: Enterprise Solutions
aboutUs.content: Reliable, secure internet connectivity for businesses on-the-go, with scalable, efficient solutions that ensure seamless integration and smooth operations anywhere

aboutUs.title: Partnerships
aboutUs.content: Our partnerships are built on trust and collaboration, working together to drive innovation, expand opportunities, and create mutual success

aboutUs.title: Custom Solutions
aboutUs.content: Discover our custom solutions tailored to meet your unique needs. We work closely with you to design innovative, flexible services that drive success and enhance your business outcomes

services.title: Global Coverage
services.content: Stay connected across 160 countries, no matter where your journey takes you with Yoowifi's travel wifi services.

services.title: Multihoming Network
services.content: Ensure uninterrupted connectivity with our multi-homing network, offering multiple connections for enhanced reliability and performance

services.title: Zero Touch on Demand
services.content: Our cloud-based portal preconfigures and deploys services for zero-touch on-demand connectivity, technical expertise required on-site.

services.title: Cost Efficient Service
services.content: Enjoy high-quality services at competitive prices, designed to deliver maximum value while staying cost-effective

services.title: Management Portal
services.content: Our management portal provides a user-friendly platform for seamless control and monitoring, empowering you to manage services efficiently

services.title: App Customization
services.content: Customize your app for a personalized experience, tailored to your brand and goals

whatWeDo.title: Business Continuity Plan
whatWeDo.content: Yoowifi offer a technological solution that provides a robust and highly redundant platform to keep your business connected and continue operating despite uncertainties.

whatWeDo.title: In-vehicle Connectivity
whatWeDo.content: Yoowifi supply the necessary bandwidth for secure transmission and receipt of data, whether it is being transmitted in-state or across different countries.

whatWeDo.title: Remote Working
whatWeDo.content: Our remote working solutions ensure uninterrupted connectivity, allowing teams to collaborate efficiently and stay productive, regardless of location.

whatWeDo.title: Connectivity for Events
whatWeDo.content: Ensure flawless event experiences with our reliable connectivity solutions, offering fast, secure internet that keeps your event running smoothly from start to finish

whatWeDo.title: Travel Agency Solutions
whatWeDo.content: We partner with travel agencies to provide the best internet solutions, ensuring seamless connectivity for travelers and enhancing the overall travel experience

whatWeDo.title: Hotels
whatWeDo.content: We offer customized internet solutions for hotels, ensuring fast, reliable connectivity that enhances guest satisfaction and supports efficient hotel operations

stayConnectedYourWay.heading: Stay Connected Your Way
stayConnectedYourWay.subHeading: Purchase or rent a device with flexibility to match your connectivity needs. Choose between owning a long-term solution or renting for short-term use, ensuring you have reliable access whenever you need it.

ways.title: Buy Your Own Device
ways.description: Purchase a device for long-term, reliable connectivity whenever you need it.

ways.title: Rental
ways.description: Access reliable connectivity when you need it with flexible, short-term device rental options—ideal for trips, events, or temporary use.

whatsIncluded.heading: What's Included
whatsIncluded.subHeading: Everything You Need for Seamless Connectivity

howToConnect.heading: How to connect Pocketwifi?
howToConnect.subHeading: Effortlessly Connect to Your Pocket WiFi in Just a Few Simple Steps

steps.title: Turn On the Pocket WiFi
steps.description: Press the power button to turn it on and wait for it to connect to the network.

steps.title: Find the WiFi Name
steps.description: Check the device's screen for the WiFi network name (SSID).

steps.title: Connect to WiFi
steps.description: On your smartphone, tablet, or laptop, open WiFi settings, select the SSID, enter the password displayed on the device, and you will be connected to the internet.

howToReturn.heading: How to Return Device?
howToReturn.subHeading: Follow our easy steps to ensure a hassle-free return experience.

cardData.title: Singpost Drop-Off
cardData.description: When you rent the device, a pre-paid return label will be included in the package. You can use this label to easily mail the device back. After returning it, you’ll likely receive an email confirmation once the return is processed.

cardData.title: Pickup Drop off Locations
cardData.description: With Yoowifi, you can effortlessly pick up your device at any of our designated locations and return it at one of our 30+ convenient drop-off points across the island. This streamlined process guarantees a hassle-free experience, allowing you to stay connected wherever your travels take you!

planTopUp.heading: How to do a plan Top up
planTopUp.subHeading: Easily Manage Your Data Needs with Yoowifi Top-Up

steps.title: Select Your Device
steps.description: Open the Yoowifi app, go to My Data, and select the device you want to top up.

steps.title: Choose Your Plan
steps.description: Click on Add Data, select your desired country and plan, then set the start and end dates.

steps.title: Proceed to Checkout
steps.description: Confirm your selections and proceed to checkout.

product.name: Router
product.description: The Yoowifi Router offers seamless and reliable internet connectivity at home or in the office. With advanced features and high-speed connectivity, it ensures that you stay connected without any interruptions. The router is easy to set up and use, making it the perfect solution for all your internet needs.

howToConnectRouter.heading: How to connect Router?
howToConnectRouter.subHeading: Step-by-step guide to easily set up your eSIM
steps: Connect the power adapter to the WiFi router and plug it into the power socket. Then, turn on the power socket.
To connect to your WiFi network, locate the default WiFi name and password on the underside / back of the WiFi Router.
Connect to the default WiFi name and enter the password when prompted, and you're all set!

product.name: SIM/eSIM
product.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typeset industry.Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

tabs.title: Description
tabs.content: Our Sim/E-Sim is perfect for those who value convenience and ease of use. You can activate it within minutes and start enjoying all the benefits that come with it. Whether you’re a student, a working professional, or anyone who needs a reliable telecommunications service, our Sim/E-Sim is the perfect solution for you. We offer competitive pricing, flexible plans, and excellent customer support to ensure that you get the best value for your money!

tabs.title: Terms & Conditions
tabs.content:
One-time use physical SIM card expiry date would be 60 days after purchase
 No refunds or cancellations can be made for eSIM due to eSIM compatibility issues.
 Do not delete or remove your eSIM from your device after successful installation.
 General terms and conditions apply.

features.heading: Key Features
features.subHeading: Don't let slow internet tie you down! Switch to our portable solutions to experience connectivity without boundaries.

howToSetup.heading: How to Set Up Your SIM
howToSetup.subHeading: Don't let slow internet tie you down! Switch to our portable solutions to experience connectivity without boundaries.

steps.title: Purchase A SIM Card
steps.description: Easily order a SIM card via the Yoowifi app, and enjoy the convenience of having it delivered right to your doorstep.

steps.title: Insert SIM Card
steps.description: Insert SIM card and power on your mobile device.*Data validity starts immediately upon the first insertion of SIM at destination.

steps.title: Enable Data Roaming
steps.description: Enable Data Roaming on your mobile device.*If your phone is unable to detect the Data Roaming activation, reboot after step 2 and kindly ensure your Data Roaming is switch on.

activateSteps.heading: Easy Steps to Activate Your eSIM

deviceSteps.title: Step 1
deviceSteps.description: Activating your eSIM on the Yoowifi app
steps: After purchasing the eSIM, go to My Orders and click the Activate eSIM button to complete the activation.
Once activated, the eSIM will appear under My Data.

deviceSteps.title: Step 2
steps: Go to your iPhone’s settings. Tap on Cellular or Mobile Data.
Tap on Add eSIM
Tap on Use QR Code
Scan the QR code you received after purchasing the eSIM in the Yoowifi app or enter Details manually.

deviceSteps.title: Step 3
steps: If you're setting up manually, you may need to enter the activation details provided in the Yoowifi app under your eSIM order, which can be found in My Data.
Continue to activate eSIM.
Select the eSIM that has been added once you reach your travel destination, then enable Data Roaming to connect.

deviceSteps.title: Step 1
deviceSteps.description: Activating your eSIM on the Yoowifi app
steps: After purchasing the eSIM, go to My Orders and click the Activate eSIM button to complete the activation.
Once activated, the eSIM will appear under My Data.

deviceSteps.title: Step 2
steps: Go to your iPhone’s settings. Tap on Cellular or Mobile Data.
Tap on Add eSIM
Tap on Use QR Code
Scan the QR code you received after purchasing the eSIM in the Yoowifi app or enter Details manually.

deviceSteps.title: Step 3
steps: If you're setting up manually, you may need to enter the activation details provided in the Yoowifi app under your eSIM order, which can be found in My Data.
Continue to activate eSIM.
Select the eSIM that has been added once you reach your travel destination, then enable Data Roaming to connect.

deviceCompatibilities.heading: Check Device Compatibility
deviceCompatibilities.subHeading: If you are using eSIM for the first time, you may need to check if your device supports eSIM. And we would like to help you with just that. Select your device brand and see if your models are listed. You can confirm further by checking the Settings page of your device.

howToTopUp.heading: How to Top up SIM/eSIM
howToTopUp.subHeading: 3 Simple Steps to Top Up Your SIM/eSIM

steps.title: Open the Yoowifi App
steps.description: In the Yoowifi app, navigate to My Data and select the SIM or eSIM you want to top up.

steps.title: Add Data
steps.description: Tap on Add Data, then choose your destination country, plan, data size, and select number of days.

steps.title: Proceed to Checkout
steps.description: Confirm your selections and proceed to checkout.

header.title: About Us
header.description: Yoowifi is a Singapore-based company that provides pocket wifi rental services for travelers. We offer a wide range of pocket wifi devices with unlimited data plans to keep you connected wherever you go.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description:
UR Communications Pte Ltd, operating under the renowned brand name Yoowifi, introduces an advanced solution for effortless global connectivity via its intuitive mobile application. With a commitment to enriching travel journeys and fostering global communication, Yoowifi App delivers unmatched convenience, dependability, and cost-effectiveness. 

Our aspiration is to establish a world where telecom experts and travelers can effortlessly stay linked across countries, free from concerns about excessive data roaming fees. Our mission revolves around building a company that offers accessible, trustworthy, and boundary-free mobile services, empowering individuals to stay connected with their dear ones while exploring diverse corners of the globe.

mission.title: Stay Connected Anytime, Anywhere
mission.description: Our mission is to deliver accessible, reliable, and boundary-free data services. We strive to empower individuals to stay seamlessly connected with their loved ones while exploring new cultures, experiencing adventures, and navigating diverse corners of the globe, ensuring a seamless and enriching connectivity experience.

details.title: Most Innovative Travel Wi-Fi Solutions Company 2024
details.description: Awarded by AI Business Excellence Awards

details.title: Singapore's Fastest Growing Companies 2024
details.description: Awarded by The Straits Times & Statista

details.title: Management Portal
details.description: Our management portal provides a user-friendly platform for seamless control and monitoring, empowering you to manage services efficiently.

details.title: Mobile general solutions
details.description: Our mobile solutions offer reliable, flexible, and cutting-edge services to keep you connected anytime, anywhere, tailored for both personal and business use.

details.title: Custom solutions
details.description: Discover our custom solutions tailored to meet your unique needs. We work closely with you to design innovative, flexible services that drive success and enhance your business outcomes.

details.title: Events & Roadshows
details.description: Join us at our exciting events and roadshows, where we present innovative solutions, engage with customers, and shape the future of seamless communication.

personal.heading: For Personal
personal.subHeading: Reliable Solutions for Your Personal Connectivity

content.title: Global Coverage
content.description: Stay connected across 160 countries, no matter where your journey takes you with Yoowifi's travel wifi services.

content.title: Flexible Data Plans
content.description: Choose from a variety of flexible data options, allowing you to select the perfect plan based on your usage needs.

content.title: Hassle-Free Delivery
content.description: Enjoy hassle-free delivery with fast, reliable service that gets your order to you with ease and convenience.

faqs.heading: Support & FAQ
faqs.subHeading: Dive in to find straightforward solutions, helpful tips, and make the most of your journey with Yoowifi.

content.question: Can I make calls with the pocket wifi?
content.answer: The pocket wifi only gives you an internet connection; it does not enable regular voice calls via your cellular network. However, it does allow VoIP calls such as Skype, Viber, and Google Voice.

content.question: What's the difference between a megabyte (MB) and a gigabyte (GB)?
content.answer: A megabyte (MB) is 1,024 kilobytes (KB), while a gigabyte (GB) is 1,024 megabytes. Generally, 1GB equals 1,024MB.

content.question: How can I return pocket wifi at the end of my rental period?
content.answer: You can return your pocket wifi by following the instructions provided during rental. Typically, this includes returning it at a drop-off location or via a provided return envelope.

content.question: Can I amend my booking information after placing an order?
content.answer: Yes, you can amend your booking information after placing an order by contacting our support team, who will assist you with the necessary changes.

content.question: How can I cancel my booking?
content.answer: To cancel your booking, please reach out to our customer service team. Cancellations may be subject to our cancellation policy.

content.question: I will be traveling to many different countries all over the world, how many devices do I need?
content.answer: The number of devices you need depends on your travel itinerary. Typically, one device per region or country with specific data coverage would be recommended.

footer.heading: Still have questions?

setupPocketWifi.heading: How to connect Pocketwifi?
setupPocketWifi.subHeading: Effortlessly Connect to Your Pocket WiFi in Just a Few Simple Steps

setupSteps.title: Turn On the Pocket WiFi
setupSteps.description: Press the power button to turn it on and wait for it to connect to the network.

setupSteps.title: Find the WiFi Name
setupSteps.description: Check the device's screen for the WiFi network name (SSID).

setupSteps.title: Connect to WiFi
setupSteps.description: On your smartphone, tablet, or laptop, open WiFi settings, select the SSID, enter the password displayed on the device, and you will be connected to the internet.

returnDevicePocketWifi.heading: How to Return Device?
returnDevicePocketWifi.subHeading: Follow our easy steps to ensure a hassle-free return experience.

cardData.title: Singpost Drop-Off
cardData.description: When you rent the device, a pre-paid return label will be included in the package. You can use this label to easily mail the device back. After returning it, you’ll likely receive an email confirmation once the return is processed.

cardData.title: Pickup Drop off Locations
cardData.description: With Yoowifi, you can effortlessly pick up your device at any of our designated locations and return it at one of our 30+ convenient drop-off points across the island. This streamlined process guarantees a hassle-free experience, allowing you to stay connected wherever your travels take you!

pocketWifiTopUp.heading: How to do a plan Top up
pocketWifiTopUp.subHeading: Easily Manage Your Data Needs with Yoowifi Top-Up

setupSteps.title: Select Your Device
setupSteps.description: Open the Yoowifi app, go to My Data, and select the device you want to top up.

setupSteps.title: Choose Your Plan
setupSteps.description: Click on Add Data, select your desired country and plan, then set the start and end dates.

setupSteps.title: Proceed to Checkout
setupSteps.description: Confirm your selections and proceed to checkout.

section2Header.heading: Privacy Policy
section2Header.text: Your privacy is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this Privacy Policy, in compliance with the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (Cap. 486) (the “Ordinance”), for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of your personal information. The following outlines our Privacy Policy.

privacyPolicy.title: 1. Your personal data and our usage of it
privacyPolicy.text: The Company collects personal information to ensure we can fulfill your rental order(s) and ensure that you may have a satisfactory shopping experience online and in our store(s).

ul.li: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Wifipack Ltd. at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

privacyPolicy.title: 2. Direct Marketing
privacyPolicy.text:
In confirming your rental contract, you have specifically consented to us using your personal information to conduct direct marketing activities with you. Our direct marketing activities shall only be conducted with respect to our promotional offers in our products and services (“Wifi Products”).

The direct marketing activities that we may conduct with you shall include sending to you email, text or other mobile messages or printed communications about Wifi Products and events or promotions that the Company may conduct online or at our store(s) with respect to Wifi Products.

Please be informed that you shall have the right to opt out in respect of these direct marketing activities. In the event that you want to exercise your opt out right, you may do so, before confirming your rental contract, by clicking [unsubscribe from our mailing list] to opt out from receiving direct marketing activities from the Company. Alternatively, you may prefer to contact us at hello@wifibb.com or call us at (852) 3184 0668 for help.

Please be assured that in the marketing or promotional emails we send to you, we will also provide you with an option to unsubscribe in future.​​

privacyPolicy.title: 3. Security and protection of your information
privacyPolicy.text:
We may use your personal information to meet our customer services commitments such as arranging your order or preventing frauds. Access to such information is protected by physical, electronic and managerial measures and we therefore limit the access to your information to our employees and agents who need it to do their jobs.

We will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. However, neither people nor security systems are foolproof. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security and we may not be able to prevent unauthorized access to such information by third parties or any inadvertent disclosure of such information during any such data transfers. Users acknowledge this risk when using our services.

privacyPolicy.title: 4. Disclosure of your personal information
privacyPolicy.text:
Your personal information held by the Company will be kept confidential but we may disclose information to our affiliates or related companies or those service providers to the Company which are under a strict obligation of confidentiality, where such disclosure is necessary to satisfy the purpose, or a directly related purpose, for which the data was collected.

We do not provide any personally identifiable customer information to any advertisers or third-party websites unless your specific written consent is obtained. If you follow a link to any of these websites or submit information to third parties via our websites, please check and read their own privacy policy before submitting your details. Kindly note that we do not accept any responsibility or liability in connection with such submission of information to third parties.

Your personal data may also be disclosed to any person or persons pursuant to any statutory or contractual obligations or as required by court of law, provided such person or persons shall be able to prove the required right/authority to access such information. In addition, your personal data may be disclosed under any of the circumstances described in Part VII of the Ordinance as exemption from the provisions of the Ordinance.

privacyPolicy.title: 5. How to check and update your information
privacyPolicy.text: We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes. In case you may wish to verify or update any personal information that you have submitted to us by contacting us at hello@wifibb.com or call us at (852) 3184 0668 for help.

privacyPolicy.title: 6. Our Corporate Policy
privacyPolicy.text: Our Officers, management and staff members shall, at all times, respect the confidentiality of and endeavour to keep safe any and all personal data collected and/or stored and/or transmitted and/or used for, or on behalf of the Company.  The Company shall endeavour to ensure all collection, storage, transmission and other handling of usage of personal data shall be done on accordance with the obligations and requirements of the Ordinance.

privacyPolicy.title: 7. Changes to this Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.text: We may, from time to time, amend this Privacy Policy, in whole or part, in our sole discretion to clarify our practices and to reflect new or different privacy practices. Any changes to this Privacy Policy will be effective immediately upon the posting of the revised policy on our website. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, which may be amended from time to time, in whole or part, you must terminate your use of our services. In any event, by continuing to use our services following any changes to this Privacy Policy, you are deemed to have agreed to such changes.
